pages.text: Eryops is a large temnospondyl from the Permian period. It grew to a little over 2 meters long and it had a large broad skull and a large body with a relatively short tail. It was an apex predator capable of competing with the synapsid predators of its time. It was a semi aquatic animal that would have inhabited the rivers and streams and preyed on fish and aquatic tetrapods.
